content.html: Management: “We need a rigorous process for managing and approving pay rises, occurring once per year.” Employees: *Apply for a new jobs because it’s quicker and easier than following the pay rise process.* Management: “Why is our churn rate so high!?”
content.value:
Management: “We need a rigorous process for managing and approving pay rises, occurring once per year.”

Employees: *Apply for a new jobs because it’s quicker and easier than following the pay rise process.*

Management: “Why is our churn rate so high!?”
